definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: rush;— (Thes al. cp. Targum [[חְלַח]], Syr. s.lah., cleave, penetrate, then advance, v. foll.);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. [[וְחָֽלְתָה]] consec. 1Sa 10:6; 3 pl. [[חָֽלְחוּ]] 2Sa 19:18; Impf. 3 ms. [[יִחְלַח]] Am 5:6 (v. infr.), 3 fs. [[וַתִּחְלַח]] Ju Jdg 14:6 +;—rush, [[הַיַּרְדֵּן]] ´[[וְח]] 2Sa 19:18 they rushed into the Jordan (dub., v. Dr HPS), [[דָּאֵשׁ בֵּית יוׂסֵף]] ´[[יִח]] Am 5:6 lest he rush like fire upon the house of Joseph (or O house, etc. GASm; Now conj. [[יַצִּית בָּאֵשׁ]]); esp. of sudden possession by ([[אֱהִֽים]]) ´[[י]], c. [[רוּחַ עַל]], c. pers. Ju Jdg 14:6 the Spirit…rushed upon him, so v:Jdg 14:19, Jdg 15:14, 1Sa 10:6, 1Sa 10:10, 1Sa 11:6; c. [[אֶל]] pers. 1Sa 16:13 and (of [[רָעָה]] ´[[רוּחַ ח]]) 1Sa 18:10.
